a) Root Cause Analysis: Foreign object damage to critical surface
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Actuator System component. Analysis of
operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes

ii. Preventive Action: Conduct fleet-wide inspection campaign

Remarks: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.
